title: Trump Pressed for Ukraine Envoy’s Removal, She Tells Lawmakers
text:
WASHINGTON—President Trump for more than a year had pressured the State Department to remove the former U.S. ambassador to Ukraine, the envoy told lawmakers Friday in closed-door testimony.

Commenting for the first time on what she called a “concerted campaign” against her, Marie Yovanovitch, whom Mr. Trump removed from her post in May and who has drawn keen interest from House Democrats in their impeachment inquiry, said she didn’t know why she was targeted by Trump allies outside the administration, including his personal...
description: President Trump for more than a year had pressured the State Department to remove the former U.S. ambassador to Ukraine, the envoy told lawmakers Friday in closed-door testimony.
